titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry star Carl Smith at Music Mt. Theatre (16493)

mods.abstract: Three color window card (red and black on yellow) announcing Grand Ole Opry stars Carl Smith, Gene Williams and Carole Williams at the Music Mountain Theater on July 4. Poster features metal photoplates of Carl Smith, Gene Williams and Carole Williams. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/24507.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
